import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Container, Nav, NavDropdown, Navbar} from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Header() { // const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin return (
proshop
Cart {userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ) : ( login )}
) } export default Header
